Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN AT ANN ARBOR

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript was obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap [accession number phs001782.v1.p1]. The original analysis for the dataset entitled “Placental Transcriptome and Stunting” was provided by Beverly Strassmann, Ph.D., and colleagues. We thank the study participants for their generous participation and the Malian government for authorizing this research: especially, the Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique et Technologique (CNRST), and the Comité d’Éthique, Faculté de Médecine et d’Odontostomatologie, Université des Sciences, des Techniques et des Technologies de Bamako. We also gratefully acknowledge support from the Eunice Kennedy Shriver National Institute of Child Health and Human Development [R21 HD077465-01A1, R01 HD088521] and the John Templeton Foundation (Grant ID: 52269).
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: All requestors and data users must provide a local Institutional Review Board (IRB) letter from their respective institution approving conduct of the proposed research project. The IRB letter must explicitly reference the use of the "Placental Transcriptome and Stunting" dataset. Because the subjects for this study are from Mali, Africa, these is a requirement of the Malian government that studies using Malian subjects also require approval of the Malian IRB. The PI of this dataset, Dr. Beverly Strassmann, can provide the necessary contact information in Mali to obtain this approval [ bis@umich.edu ]. As in the case of local IRB approval, the Malian IRB letter must explicitly reference the use of the "Placental Transcriptome and Stunting" dataset The requestor of this dataset must provide a letter of collaboration with Dr. Strassmann and her collaborators. Use of the "Placental Transcriptome and Stunting" dataset also requires dissemination of the results to the scientific community by means of publication. The annual progress report should cite work done that relates specifically to the “Placental Transcriptome and Stunting" dataset and not just a generic report for a series of datasets that may also have been requested at the same time.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB, PUB, COL)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB-PUB-COL
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s).
